# GitHub Copilot Coding Agent Instructions

This directory contains instructions for the GitHub Copilot coding agent to provide context-aware assistance when working with this repository.

## Files

- **`coding-agent-instructions.md`** - Repository-specific guidance for the Copilot coding agent, including architecture overview, development workflows, testing strategies, and best practices.

## Purpose

These instructions help the Copilot coding agent understand:
- The project's architecture and component relationships
- Development environment setup and tooling
- Testing matrix and CI/CD workflows
- Code conventions and contribution guidelines
- Manual verification procedures

## Related Files

- **`.github/copilot-instructions.md`** - Instructions for GitHub Copilot in IDEs (VS Code, JetBrains, etc.)

Both files contain the same guidance to ensure consistent assistance across different Copilot interfaces.
